body:
Hola!
So my name is Arachadonic (as you can see..), I am 17 years old and from the wonderfully leprachaun free Ireland! I've been playing minecraft for over 2 years now maybe and still am in love with it.
I love going out with friends, playing games (feel free to add me on steam) and really just usual stuff.
I currently have a job working in my local St.Vincent de Paul shop and love it as everyday I meet new people and it feels good to work for a charity.
I'm currently staff on a famous minigame server that I won't mention because advertising, duh. I'm not quite sure how I came across this server but I love the minigames and the size as it isnt too big but not too small that its boring. 

Anyway I'll see y'all around!
oh also I don't speak spanish in-case the "hola" confused you.
body_tagged:

title: Arachadonic Here!

replies.body: Hey Arachadonic, welcome to Avicus! It's good to see you're enjoying the minigames :)

replies.body: Hey Hey! ! :D Welcome to the Avicus Community! Feel free to ask any Staff Members any questions or concerns you may have, as we will help you! ! As for that, enjoy your stay here at this wonderful server ! ! :DD (You'll love it here ;)

replies.body:
Wassup! I'm apricot, but most know me as April... Blame YoavKipper for that ;P

if you ever need anything, feel free to contact any of the staff in game or Skype, we're all here to help ^_^

Are you from Northern Ireland or The Republic of Ireland? If so, do you consider yourself British? ;3
